title: Collaboration-Based Elementary AI Education Project to Address Gender Gaps and Strengthen Civic Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced learning completion and experience in high-level project execution, understanding of basic social structures, and collaborative learning experience
context.additional_context: Utilizing experiential learning tools in BYOD environments, measuring competencies through project-based assessments, and contributing to gender equality culture through school-home-community linkage activities

learning_goals: Learners can enhance social relationship-building skills by designing collaborative AI solutions to address real-life problems.
Learners can form positive perceptions and behavioral intentions toward AI technology without gender stereotypes and recognize their rights as digital citizens.
Learners can explain fundamental AI system principles using experiential tools and explore the balance between technological advancement and social responsibility.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
